page.title: 12A HOUSEWIFE'S STORY
page.content:
I have lived here for five years. I have previously lived in three houses and two flats. I get up at 8 o'clock on weekdays and 9 o'clock at weekends. I dress, and make breakfast for the two girls and take them to school. I have mine with my husband later. We have toast or bacon and egg and a drink of coffee. I wash the clothes three times a week in the washer. I help my husband in the garden. We grow vegetables and fruit. I go shopping to Sherburn and Garforth every Friday at 10.30am. I might go to the village shop now and again. I clean the house every day and wash the dishes. Dinner is at twelve noon for my husband, little girl and me. At five o'clock we all have tea.
{Continued}
